original_text: In his days Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up, and Jehoiakim became his servant three years: then he turned and rebelled against him.
korean_text: 여호야김 시대에 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살이 올라오매 여호야김이 삼 년간 섬기다가 돌아서 그를 배반하였더니

sentences.original_text: In his days Nebuchadnezzar king of Babylon came up
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 시대에 바빌론 왕 느부갓네살이 올라왔고

sentences.original_text: and Jehoiakim became his servant three years
sentences.korean_translation: 여호야김이 그의 종이 되었으니 삼 년이었더라

sentences.original_text: then he turned and rebelled against him
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그가 돌이켜 그를 대적하여 반역하였더라
